Preferred Skills: Experience analyzing publicly traded companies or startups. Knowledge of real estate markets and trends, particularly land valuation. Hands-on experience with high-impact projects in real estate, finance, and startups. Opportunity to grow alongside a portfolio of ventures in diverse industries. Professional development and mentorship from experienced business leaders. If you're detail-oriented, eager to learn, and passionate about research and valuation, we encourage you to apply! Founded in 2022, but with history going back to 1939, Norstella unites best-in-class brands to help clients navigate the complexities at each step of the drug development life cycle —and get the right treatments to the right patients at the right time. Job Description  Team Overview The Market Research team supports the qualitative and quantitative market research function at Norstella. The team ensures the derivation of valuable and actionable insights and strategy via data analysis to facilitate the delivery of the highest quality deliverables to pharmaceutical clients.
